channel.title: James Vanderbilt on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in James Vanderbilt on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Nuremberg’ Review: Potent Performances by Russell Crowe and Rami Malek Ignite a Bracingly Relevant Historical Drama
item.description: Written and directed by James Vanderbilt, this chronicle of the events leading up to the Nuremberg trials also features Michael Shannon and Leo Woodall in key supporting roles.

item.title: ‘Nuremberg’ Review: Potent Performances by Russell Crowe and Rami Malek Ignite a Bracingly Relevant Historical Drama
item.description: Written and directed by James Vanderbilt, this chronicle of the events leading up to the Nuremberg trials also features Michael Shannon and Leo Woodall in key supporting roles.

item.title: James Vanderbilt on Pitting Russell Crowe Against Rami Malek in TIFF Thriller ‘Nuremberg’
item.description: The star-studded character piece about the Nuremberg Trials and showdown between a high-ranking Nazi and a psychiatrist, world premieres at Toronto: “We talked a lot about ‘The Silence of the Lambs.’”

item.title: James Vanderbilt on Pitting Russell Crowe Against Rami Malek in TIFF Thriller ‘Nuremberg’
item.description: The star-studded character piece about the Nuremberg Trials and showdown between a high-ranking Nazi and a psychiatrist, world premieres at Toronto: “We talked a lot about ‘The Silence of the Lambs.’”
